story_line1: Katie once found an egg in an abandoned bird's nest.
story_line2: All of the other eggs had hatched so she figured it was a dud.
story_line3: She brought it home and kept it in her room on display.
story_line4: Two days later it suddenly hatched!
story_line5: She kept the bird until it was good enough to be on its own.
all_goals: ['To have a keepsake', 'Take the egg.', 'Take care of the baby bird and free it when appropriate']
all_next_actions: ["She'll refrain from picking up eggs", 'Release the bird.', 'Feeds the baby bird regularly']
next_action_explanation: Make sure the bird can grow in nature.
all_explanations: ['she realizes eggs sometimes are not duds if alone', 'Make sure the bird can grow in nature.', 'Take care of the baby bird']
all_plans: ['She can go shopping for something to display instead.', 'Leave nature be.', 'Revision is not necessary.']
